title: Iatrogenie oder befreiende Psychotherapie? Der psychische Einfluss des Arztes auf seine Patienten (Iatrogeny or Liberating Psychotherapy? The Psychological Influence of the Physician on His Patients). Second revised edition. By N. Schipkowensky. (Pp. 358; price not stated). Schwabe & Co. Basel. 1977.
